TopicTitle: Air breaks seem a little too strong

Articles.Content: That is hilarious for some reason xD

Having Air Breaks take damage when subjected to a certain threshold of aerodynamic forces isn't a bad idea at all. Also, on a similar topic, it doesn't look like the aerodynamic model handles them being partially occluded by other parts, which also amplifies their usefulness. Simply making it so an airbreak that doesn't have full airflow only gives a very small portion of its breaking potential would go a long way to fixing that.

That said, keep that gif. It is funny as hell.
I don't think that is overpowered. I think you basically made a steel parachute there and while they may slow you down a little too much, so do the parachutes right now.
